title: neeraiyya
sahitya:
neeraiyaa kaavEri nityamaiyaa sanganaadam
tEraiyaa taipoosam dEsataar konDaada

caraNam 1

paasi paDarnda malaiyaam pangunitEr ODum malai
oosi paDarnda malaiyaam rudraaksham kaaykum malaiyaam
malaikkum maDa naDuvE malayaaLa dEsam ellaam
avaraDakki siraiyeDuppaar aarumuga vElavane

caraNam 2

vanDi neri neriya malaiyai cuTri tErODa
vairamaNi tEr meedil subramaNyan vaaraarO
kiNNattil candanamum kiLimooku veTrilaiyum
aLLi aLLi poojai seyvOm aaru muga vElavanE

caraNam 3

aNNanillai tambiyillai enai aadaripaar yaarumillai
aaNDavanE meyyOnE enai aadaripaar yaarumillai
uciyil jaDaiyirukkum uLLankaiyil vElirukkum
neTriyil neerirukkum neeraaDa vaaraarO

caraNam 4

aarkaaTTu seemaiyilE aarulaksham kaavaDigaL
tErkaaTTu seemaiyilE dEsamellaam kaavaDigaL
(neeraiyaa)
